select seq_review.nextval from dual
insert into review(rno, c_nick, r_comment, r_star, mno, cno) values(#{rno}, #{c_nick}, #{r_comment}, #{r_star}, #{mno}, #{cno})
mapper.update: update review set m_time = #{m_time} where m_title = #{m_title}
mapper.select: select count(*) from review where m_title = #{m_title}
select mno from review where m_title = #{m_title}
select m_time from review where m_title = #{m_title}
select * from review where rownum between 0 and 10 order by mno
select * from review where rownum between 0 and 3 order by mno desc
select count(*) from review where mno = #{mno}
